name: Wrecking Ball Princess
description:
This is our bullet hell where you don't shoot back. Instead, you block bullets with your wrecking ball, which collects bad guys, too.

Use WASD/Arrows/Analog stick to move around. Use the mouse or a game pad button to release your wrecking ball.
